xml.data:
Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Naupanissayaduka
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Naupanissayaduka
502.
1730Naupanissayapaccayā hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, avigate terasa…pe… .
  •  Aṭṭhaka
<< Navakaup Aṭṭhaka >>
